TopicTitle: After seeing the Kerbal smilies I could no longer sit idly by without an account

Articles.Content:
Hello!

I'm Jack and I finally took some time out of rocket building to post

I'm still a little bit in the sucking stage right now but I think I'm improving anyway just saying hello to you all!
Welcome to the forums Jack! I think at some point we all were in the sucking stage,(except for Scott Manley-he was awesome from the start) and I'm glad that you're at least trying to make rockets.
Why hello there mate!Trust me,we all sucked at the start.But then we discovered the "Booster+Booster+Booster+Necessary Stuff=Awesomeness" Rule.AKA Moar Boosters!!!
Welcome Jack! Nothing wrong with sucking at this game I know I still do after some ~200 hours of play.
By "necessary stuff" he means MOAR STRUTS. Welcome!
Get started with space planes early. I didn't, and its still hard for me.

It took me something like 100 iterations before I got into orbit, so don't feel bad. 90% of them blew up or shook themselves to pieces on the way up.

Welcome to the forum!
Welcome to the forums! When I started, I didn't know how to launch.
Remember to control your ship through the navball, and if you can't, do the tutorials!
